comment: по клику на труп, лучше всего висящий на шипе

languages.text: Покойник со снисходительной улыбкой зовет тебя занять место рядом с ним. Он что-то понял в этой жизни.
The dead man grins condescendingly, beckoning you to take a place beside him. He has this life figured out.
languages.original_text: Покойник со снисходительной улыбкой зовет тебя занять место рядом с ним. Он что-то понял в этой жизни.

traits.locale_text: The dead man grins condescendingly, beckoning you to take a place beside him. He got this life figured out.
The dead man grins condescendingly, beckoning you to take a place beside him. He got this life figured out.
The dead man grins condescendingly, beckoning you to take a place beside him. He has this life figured out.
The dead man grins condescendingly, beckoning you to take a place beside him. He has this life figured out.
The dead man grins condescendingly, beckoning you to take a place beside him. He has this life figured out.

languages.text: 那个死者对你露出了屈尊纡贵的笑容，示意你坐在他旁边。他对死后的生活了如指掌。
languages.original_text: The dead man grins condescendingly, beckoning you to take a place beside him. He has this life figured out.

traits.locale_text: 那个死者对你露出了屈尊纡贵的笑容，示意你坐在他旁边。他对死后的生活了如指掌。

languages.text: 死んだ男がふてぶてしくもにたりと笑い、隣へ来るように手招きした。彼は自分の人生がこうなるとわかっていたのだ。
languages.original_text: The dead man grins condescendingly, beckoning you to take a place beside him. He has this life figured out.

traits.locale_text: 死んだ男がふてぶてしくもにたりと笑い、隣へ来るように手招きした。彼は自分の人生がこうなるとわかっていたのだ。

languages.text: Le mort sourit avec condescendance, vous invitant à prendre place à côté de lui. Il a tout compris à cette vie.
languages.original_text: The dead man grins condescendingly, beckoning you to take a place beside him. He has this life figured out.

traits.locale_text: Le mort sourit avec condescendance, vous invitant à prendre place à côté de lui. Il a tout compris à cette vie.

languages.text: El hombre muerto ríe con condescendencia, invitándote a ponerte cómod{mf|o|a} su lado. Parece haber comprendido el significado de la vida.
languages.original_text: The dead man grins condescendingly, beckoning you to take a place beside him. He has this life figured out.

traits.locale_text: El hombre muerto ríe con condescendencia, invitándote a ponerte cómod{mf|o|a} su lado. Parece haber comprendido el significado de la vida.

languages.text: Der tote Mann grinst herablassen und fordert dich auf, dich neben ihn zu setzen. Er hat dieses eben hinter sich.
languages.original_text: The dead man grins condescendingly, beckoning you to take a place beside him. He has this life figured out.

traits.locale_text: Der tote Mann grinst herablassen und fordert dich auf, dich neben ihn zu setzen. Er hat dieses eben hinter sich.

languages.text: Ölü adamın küçümser sırıtışı, seni yanına yığılmaya davet ediyor. Adam hayatı çözmüş.
languages.original_text: The dead man grins condescendingly, beckoning you to take a place beside him. He has this life figured out.

traits.locale_text: Ölü adamın küçümser sırıtışı, seni yanına yığılmaya davet ediyor. Adam hayatı çözmüş.
